Blog.post: hmm, apple wasn't satisfied with the apple mouse and the apple keyboard so now their introducing the "New Apple Pro Mouse" and "New Apple Pro Keyboard" While this may simply be a strange mistake, previous Panther screenshots haved provided "confirmation" of an upccoming Apple Wireless Keyboard and Mouse. And one reader report indicates that the Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard/Mouse support comes built into Mac OS X 10.2.7 on the shipping PowerMac G5.

So the short stories that has been sent to the WH Smiths magasine in the UK is now published on the internet! You can read the stories , wich are correction of for ex. Cohen's age mystery. urlLink This is the place

Troll bridge are about to become a movie. Troll Bridge- The Moving Picture So there is at last someone who understand the pure genious of Terry Pratchett's Discworld. Read more about the shooting here: urlLink Troll Bridge - The Moving Picture
Now indeed, what company is making the trailer to Pirates of the Caribbean? Yes, I'ts apple. The trailer is avilable at: urlLink Go for it!
Starting up a new blog, first try though. Later on I'll gather info to start update this blog.
